website_summaries.verdict: The absence of products that support Trans-Port and the uncertainty of MotionPlus compatibility may have you waiting until you pull the trigger on a Nyko Wand.
pros: Trans-Port technology opens up plenty of expansion options
cons: doesn't include a rechargeable battery pack

customer_reviews.title: I hate them. They are plastic turds.
customer_reviews.text: These controllers often stop working for no discernable reason. They also continuously unpair from the Wii and good luck getting them to pair again the same day. So if you like really long pauses in your gameplay, you will love these. I hate to say it is worth forking over the $40 for the Nintendo brand because that is highway robbery, but it is most decidedly NOT worth paying any amount of money for these useless pieces of plastic crap.
customer_reviews.author: M. Woodcock

customer_reviews.title: Cheapskate tax in full swing on me
customer_reviews.text: stopped working after a few days never really worked with the nunchucks. I unfortunatly didnt act fast enough to return them and lost my $. The unit would short out and lose signal to the wii if the nun chucks (also nyko brand) were ever plugged in. they would sporadically lose connection to the wii even if you did not use the nunchuck.I hoped it would be decent, at least acceptable, but it turned out to be a bad buy. the allure of a low price was too much, now I have to buy another set and pay the full price for the real Nintendo ones. I call this my cheapskate tax. Hurts my ego and wallet.
customer_reviews.author: Bablock

customer_reviews.title: Better than the official Wiimote, if you ask me.
customer_reviews.text: I actually like the Nyko Wiimote better than the original one. Functionally it's exactly the same, but the buttons are a bit bigger, which is nice for my big clumsy fingers :-P. I also like the colored buttons. Makes it much easier to teach a newbie how to play when you can just say "hit the red button" instead of having to pause while they examine it to figure out which one is "A". All the motion sensory and stuff seems identical to the official Wiimote, so no worries there. Good controller, and cheap too. I'd recommend it :-)
customer_reviews.author: LostInTheWoods

customer_reviews.title: Check Compatibility before Buying.
customer_reviews.text: Doesn’t come with the chargers which I knew but when I ordered the Nyko charging pad they don’t fit together. A large waste of money. I should have returned them. Be sure to check compatibility.
customer_reviews.author: Joyce Broils

customer_reviews.title: Love these remotes/wands.
customer_reviews.text: I love these wii remotes/wands. They operate very well however the downfall is that they come with backs that don't allow them to charge and they don't come with a rechargeable battery pack. This problem can easily be resolved by ordering the Nyko charging station (the charging station come with backs and battery packs. I own 6 of these remotes from pink, purple, orange and green. They also don't come with nunchuck, but they do come with a really cool gel protector and wrist band.
customer_reviews.author: 4Eva Shopping

customer_reviews.title: Works, some issues.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a cheap alternative for my 3 year old to use-I was afraid to let her use a more expensive model. It does occasionally disconnect and have to be re-synched, even in the middle of use. The larger buttons and rubber case make it easier for my daughter to hold, and she thinks the color is lots of fun. I have found that it "eats" batteries; I have to change them every 2-3 days-and that's with less than 3 hours of actual use!
customer_reviews.author: Summer

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: It works just like a nintendo brand does, It hasn't ever lost sync like other reviews stated. I got this one and a yellow one. the buttons are shaped different then the nintendo brand, but other than that i cant tell a difference. They do not have motion plus built in, but you can connect the motion plus dongle on these just fine. Im very pleased with both and they are used daily. Have held up great.
customer_reviews.author: G. Murray

customer_reviews.title: Pretty controller that works well....
customer_reviews.text: This purple controller feels just like Nintendo's Wii Mote. Without the rubber,grippy case it is about 1 inch smaller in length than a "real" Wiimote,which didn't bother me. I now prefer this 'mote. I had to "connect" with the Wii once. Every time I turn on the Wii,it automatically recognizes this mote. This Wii mote came with 2 very good batteries. You are able to take off the wii grippy case pretty easily. No complaints.
customer_reviews.author: JennaLee

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Though not made by Nintendo, and though it looks a little different, this third-party Wii remote works just as well for typical use. It does not have the Motion Plus built in, and the wrist strap fastener is slide-only, not slide-and-lock like Nintendo makes. Otherwise, I've had no problems using it. It syncs easily, connects every time, and works the same as my remotes made by Nintendo.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Norton

customer_reviews.title: Inconsistent
customer_reviews.text: I got several of these for my Wii U, and they haven't been very consistent. I have one that sometimes won't turn on, but I guess you get what you paid for. When they work, they work well.
customer_reviews.author: AB

customer_reviews.title: Great remote!
customer_reviews.text: This remote is a great alternative to overpriced Nintendo accesories! Bought one of these on sale on a gamble. I actually like this remote better than the Nintendo remote. No issues at all with sync, and I really like the rubberized grip on the remote too. Larger buttons are also helpful. Don't hesitate to buy one!
customer_reviews.author: Jediknightguy82

customer_reviews.title: When offered the buy all three options...beware.
customer_reviews.text: This was one of the packaged deals with my PS3, saying how much better the gaming experience would be enhanced. My son was helping me wrap and asked why I got a Wii controller with the PS3. Not being a gamer at all, I had no idea. I promptly returned this product.
customer_reviews.author: TishSparr

customer_reviews.title: Nyko Wand for Wii
customer_reviews.text: I have 2 of these remotes. PROS: Great Price (in store $30-40/ per wand) Love cool look of the Wand, Good arrival time. Great packaging. CONS: No always easy to SYNC (once in a while) i have to re-sync it to my Wii. I t can get annoying but its not that bad.
customer_reviews.author: MS.J

customer_reviews.title: Great wands
customer_reviews.text: Needed replacements,and these work well. I've bought these brand wands for our Wii before and I will (I'm sure!) be buying them again. With 4 kids and lots of fun games, our Wii gets a lot of use and it's also a great fitness system for MOM ! These wands come in other colors, and I want a pink one next for ME!
customer_reviews.author: JuliaS71

customer_reviews.title: Works ok
customer_reviews.text: They work well (I bought 2). The D-pad isnt as strange feeling as I thought it was going to be. Was 5 stars until one of the remotes needed to have the batteries pulled and resynced to the Wii. Hasn't happened since, though. Overall, I'm glad I got these. And at the "discontinued" price.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Powell

customer_reviews.title: motion sensor works only half the time
customer_reviews.text: i got this remote to use permanently on guitar hero instruments. for that purpose it does a good job. but once i tried using it for games that constantly need motion sensing it does a poor job. the motion sensor does not register quick hand movements and intermittently drops signal while in active use.
customer_reviews.author: Rommel

customer_reviews.title: Expected More
customer_reviews.text: When I saw that I could get a Wii controller in purple I almost died. I love PURPLE. When it arrived I had to play immediately. I played Super Mario Galaxy 2. I'm not the best player. But something wasn't right. Now I often sit and play, eventually I realized that I had to stand directly in front of the senor bar to play as good as I usually do. Besides that this product is great play. The kids love it so much I'm looking in to getting each of them their own in their favorite color.
customer_reviews.author: T33lips

customer_reviews.title: Connection problems from the start.
customer_reviews.text: This Wii Remote, after setting up and synchronizing it with my Wii, still requires me to make it search again and again (by pressing buttons) to make it "find" the Wii every time I turn it on. This includes times that I'm watching a movie and have to wake the remote up. It ends up taking about 5 minutes to make the remote work each time. Not worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Corban Mailloux

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy unless you own a battery factory
customer_reviews.text: This remote eats batteries!!! Even when not being used, it sucks down 2 AA batteries in less than 48 hours (I tested it!) We thought it was just a defective remote and had Amazon replace it... the second one did the same thing. I wish I would have read [...] user reviews first. Don't waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: Lori Jean

customer_reviews.title: pretty good
customer_reviews.text: im a real buyer and although this controller isn't the best its worth the price. other reviews exaggerate saying it dos'nt work well on the censor but it works just like the normal one to me,only problem is that the one i bought was kinda sticky and repetitive with the buttons but also on top of that i bought mine heavily used.
customer_reviews.author: Terrell Fields

customer_reviews.title: Awesome purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Quick shipping & good packaging! We were pleasantly surprised that it came with extras. It also came with the nunchuk controller, which was not shown in the description. My son was thrilled to the extreme! Everything was brand new, in original packaging. We are very pleased with this purchase & would definitely recommend this seller.
customer_reviews.author: ljh

customer_reviews.title: Pretty but disappointing
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this remote to play with wii resort and it does not work. does not even calabrate...The color is pretty and it came packaged nice, but thats the best I can say for it. Contacted the seller almost two weeks ago and haven't heard anything from them. Don't waste your money!
customer_reviews.author: momsboys5

customer_reviews.title: works with the wii u.
customer_reviews.text: This is a good wand. Works just like the ones that came with the wii. I am now using it with the wii u and still works perfectly. I have had these wands for several years. I use them in combination with the Nyko Wii Charge Station.
customer_reviews.author: ravens.grlTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: Just as good as a Nintendo remote,
customer_reviews.text: It works great, just like the controller that came with the Wii. It's came with a black rubber sleeve, and a red wrist strap included. The directions for syncing it up were very concise. I would recommend this controller from Nyko. 10/10 - Would check out their offerings for future controller needs.
customer_reviews.author: T P

customer_reviews.title: Not as good as the official Wii Controllers
customer_reviews.text: Charge dies within a couple of days. It is not as good as the original wii controllers
customer_reviews.author: Serkan

customer_reviews.title: Won't Sync?
customer_reviews.text: After reading many reviews leading me to believe this was a good buy, I received mine in the mail and tried to set it up with the system. After multiple attempts, new batteries - again, I had no luck getting it to sync with my console. Right now it's a plastic paperweight...
customer_reviews.author: K.Smith

customer_reviews.title: Great replacement or addition to existing Wii remotes.
customer_reviews.text: We needed one more remote and my daughter loves blue. It's fun for the kids to have their own remote and this one is a great color. Easy to find among the basket of other Wii accessories too! It works great, was easy to connect and came with the skin. I think for the money, it's a great value and I would definitely buy this again should the need arise.
customer_reviews.author: M. Blackwell

customer_reviews.title: Really bad product
customer_reviews.text: Really bad product. Keeps losing sync. Eats battery when not even in use. Need to remove battery and reinsert to resync! Just a really bad product. I only bought this because it come in Purple. i recommend NOT buying this Nyko Wand.
customer_reviews.author: Ankit Patel

customer_reviews.title: NYKO console remote for Wii in Pink
customer_reviews.text: Just like our wii remote plays well. No problems whatsoever....the only thing about this remotes including the wii one is that the batteries don't last too long if you are an every day player...I am about to invest on the rechargeable batteries for these remotes....
customer_reviews.author: Olga M.

customer_reviews.title: Waste of time and money
customer_reviews.text: I seriously thought I'd be luckier than all the people leaving bad reviews. Big mistake. Time and money wasted completely. Less than 1 week and it's dead. Just plain nothing. Stopped working completely out of nowhere. Don't chance it - you regret the hassle later. Get authentic Nintendo hardware... ------------------ UPDATE 1: Filed a claim May 28. ------------------ UPDATE 2: Feb 1. Haven't heard anything from the company, so I just filed an Amazon A-Z Claim.
customer_reviews.author: NB

customer_reviews.title: Ok remote
customer_reviews.text: This remote has created a cheap version of the wii remote at a much cheaper price.It will do as a 2nd or 3rd remote and still be ok. It is a little shaky and not as good as the original remote but for party games it will do just fine.If you dont want to spend alot on another remote,this is the way to go.Get cheapest cause the color doesn't make a differnce in performance. Enjoy this remote with friends. Buy this remote mostly for sit down games that dont require th intense motion
customer_reviews.author: Blazerfanalways

customer_reviews.title: get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.text: bought to play mario. works well enough for that. does not support plus games, sometimes starts vibrating and have to remove batteries to stop, battery prongs stick sometimes and need freed to make connection.
customer_reviews.author: CF

customer_reviews.title: WORKS GREAT
customer_reviews.text: This always works great for all out games. the buttons are very comfortable on your fingers.
customer_reviews.author: Peggie & Steven

customer_reviews.title: as good as the original...which isn't perfect...
customer_reviews.text: no problems with how it works so far...my only problem is the A button is too close to the pad, but the original Wiimote has that problem too. When playing Super Mario Bros. Wii, I have accidentally hit A and put myself in a bubble many times.
customer_reviews.author: rob d

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely love it!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered from websbestdeals. The buttons have a nice feel to them. It's easier to use the D-pad. They have a wii motion plus built in, which is a nice plus.
customer_reviews.author: Kayla Hoosier

customer_reviews.title: My daughter loves it!
customer_reviews.text: Fast shipping and as described!! She is so excited to have a pink controller so she can play with her big brothers and it is Pink!!!
customer_reviews.author: dad2aaa

customer_reviews.title: Okay controller
customer_reviews.text: It's very comfortable but I have encountered some issues with synching as well. It sometimes becomes unsynched with the Wii and I have to constantly sync with it. I'm hoping it does this less often! The batteries didn't seem to work really well with it either and I had to keep trying different batteries. Something may not be right with this controller.
customer_reviews.author: BlackShoe

customer_reviews.title: it works
customer_reviews.text: They work with my Wii. I did not notice any difference with the motion. They do go through batteries quickly, so you may want to look into rechargeable batteries for them.
customer_reviews.author: Abigail B

customer_reviews.title: Fun color!
customer_reviews.text: This Wii wand is just as good as an original Nintendo Wii wand and in a great purple color! It seems to work as well as our other remotes, for a great price. No complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Chelentaz

customer_reviews.title: Works Just as Good as the Wii Remote
customer_reviews.text: I was a bit nervous making this purchase as it is a third party vendor of Will remotes. The risk paid off, this remote is just as good as the official remote, has all the same features and has a nicer sleeker look that the official remote. A great buy! Been using for month now, no issues whatsoever!
customer_reviews.author: Adriatic

customer_reviews.title: Perfection and variety
customer_reviews.text: I believe in two things, giving the little guy a chance and that variety is the spice of life. I have one Nintendo wiimote that came with the system. When it came time to buy a second (with the Wii actually) I wanted to explore my options. The Nyko has a different look to it with it's larger buttons and rubberized grips. The larger buttons work better for some games and the controller is enough like the Nintendo version that compatibility is not an issue with attachments, chargers, and sleeves. It's really simple, you have a Wiimote so get this one. Try them both for different games and see which you prefer.
customer_reviews.author: Marshall L. Kiker

customer_reviews.title: It works just as it should.
customer_reviews.text: We just got this item today. I just got through playing Wii Sports with my kids and my kids are still using it. It works just like the genuine Wii remote.
customer_reviews.author: Mommy of 2 many

customer_reviews.title: Just splurge for the real deal
customer_reviews.text: Difficult to synch, sucks through batteries, won't hold a signal. It looks and feels nice, but tech products live and die on what's inside, not outside - and this device's insides were not ready for prime time. Just go for it and buy a first-party controller.
customer_reviews.author: D. Tucker

customer_reviews.title: Has worked very well so far!
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to acquire a fourth wii remote (for the purposes of playing New Super Mario Bros with as many people as possible) and found this to be the best deal coupled with quality. After receiving it, it set up and played nicely. Now, several weeks later, it is still going strong; could not be happier! :)
customer_reviews.author: Philip Grabenhorst

customer_reviews.title: Perfect purchase
customer_reviews.text: The price was just right for this wand & it works wonderfully. I would therefore recommend this item to everyone.
customer_reviews.author: Lory L.

customer_reviews.title: wonderful controller
customer_reviews.text: wonderful product by nyko,,, controller works excellent. long battery life. syncs easily, great for the wii, comes in a bunch of colors also
customer_reviews.author: forty

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work!
customer_reviews.text: It turns on, but that's about it. I was hoping it would work because they sell them in the stores......no such luck. In my opinion its just a piece of junk. Don't waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: Jenn & Angie (sisters)

customer_reviews.title: Works well.
customer_reviews.text: Does what a Wii remote should do. I also like the colors, but I'm easily amused. A really good remote for the price.
customer_reviews.author: A. B. Sartin

customer_reviews.title: 5 STARS
customer_reviews.text: excellent product and very useful .. 100% recommended for those looking for a good product and the best is the good price
customer_reviews.author: alexander

customer_reviews.title: dont buy used
customer_reviews.text: i bought mine used and it always required a full battery to work. i got rid of mine when i got a real controller.
customer_reviews.author: Crusader

customer_reviews.title: hey
customer_reviews.text: this remote works great i love it i can play the wii with more than one player now thanks a lot
customer_reviews.author: Lynette Tomasetti

customer_reviews.title: Mot what i thought but i like it
customer_reviews.text: i thought these would work with the charger they didn't but they work well with the Wii and numchucks work with them to and on Netflix it say you need to use a Nintendo remote but these work
customer_reviews.author: Dazedvenus017

customer_reviews.title: OK - but not as good as OEM
customer_reviews.text: Slight difference in response times, fit and finish not as good, and sometimes there are connectivity delays. Just buy the OEM version and you'll have no worries.
customer_reviews.author: Dev Laur

customer_reviews.title: Nice Feel
customer_reviews.text: Feels great in my hand, works great. Kids love the color and I love the price! Can't lose with this one!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy
customer_reviews.text: I have had no problems whatsoever with this remote. This is the third Nyko remote in our collection, and they all work just as well as the Wii remote, only a little cheaper.
customer_reviews.author: J. Ferguson

customer_reviews.title: Horrible, pass up
customer_reviews.text: Never worked...I even contacted the company and have never heard from then....spent a little more to get the wii name brand....pass by this product if you have a chance
customer_reviews.author: Valerie Dillon

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I prefer these to the wii remotes. They don't show it but they come with a blue sleeve.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: wille makit
customer_reviews.text: the nyko wands work just as good as the others and half the price . i will keep on buying nyko brands until they start to get about same price
customer_reviews.author: BILLY

customer_reviews.title: Bad...
customer_reviews.text: This wii remote wouldn't sync up to the wii at all. I don't recommend it. I should have returned it but I didn't bother.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney Blanchard

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Sometimes had trouble syncing to the Wii. Just be patient and keep mashing buttons.
customer_reviews.author: Elliott Schar

customer_reviews.title: Good but...
customer_reviews.text: Great product and it arrived on time but it doesnt come with any batteries. So if youre looking for one you can just recharge then you have to buy the battery for it.
customer_reviews.author: BuzyMom1188

customer_reviews.title: Thank you Nyko
customer_reviews.text: Thank you Nyko. I love this wand, with this wand I play Mario kart
customer_reviews.author: DASHAWN JOHNSON

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work with Motion Plus Unless you buy separate adapter
customer_reviews.text: I read the product description and reviews and thought this was already set up to work with the Wii out of the box. When it didn't I called Nyko customer service and was told I needed the separate WiiMotion adapter.
customer_reviews.author: Ellie Barker

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: I found this to be evert bit as good as the oem one for the wii. Buy one right now
customer_reviews.author: James J. Gross

customer_reviews.title: great
customer_reviews.text: pruduct arrived on time and very happy with it!! no problems at all I would recommendet to a friend very good
customer_reviews.author: Hector Carrillo

customer_reviews.title: Good remote but not like the original
customer_reviews.text: this remote is nice because it is not in traditional wiimote shape..it looks different. buttons are big but the home button place is not good because it make a game paused while playing...the quality of this remote is good. the big problem with this remote is the sync..sometimes it loss sync with the console.. but overall it is a nice remote with a good price
customer_reviews.author: mohab

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice third option controller
customer_reviews.text: The Wand of Nyko works very well with Wii, but it don't works with the Wii motion plus, unless you send it to Nyko to be upgraded. El Wand the Nyko funciona excelentemente bien con la consola Wii, pero no funciona con el Wii motion plus a menos que se envíe el control a Nyko para ser actualizado.
customer_reviews.author: A. Pilonieta

customer_reviews.title: Keeps freezing
customer_reviews.text: It worked 1 day only. After that, it started freezing up, even after I placed new batteries. Buttons would stop working, the cursor stopped moving. Re-syncing doesn't always work. I'd have to wait awhile before it starts working again. Not worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Gitamerah

customer_reviews.title: Good for the money
customer_reviews.text: Performs well , loses connection on wii u sometimes (Like once every few days)
customer_reviews.author: casey

customer_reviews.title: Nyko wand for Wii
customer_reviews.text: Works exactly as OEM controllers for the Wii. I don't know what else would be needed. Cheaper than Nintendo controllers is always a plus.
customer_reviews.author: House Atreides

customer_reviews.title: GREAT
customer_reviews.text: This was a great controller Brand New and with a cool Case!!! Neat Strap!!! WE LOVE IT! THANKS!!!
customer_reviews.author: Husker

customer_reviews.title: Pink is Awesome
customer_reviews.text: I had to buy a new wiimote bc mine quit workin... I love pink and cant wait to wear this on my hip while I Zumba. This was a great price as well seems how a used one is almost $20 at my local Gamestop!
customer_reviews.author: harmony greenwood

customer_reviews.title: Works Great
customer_reviews.text: This is the 1st non-Nintendo Wii wand I've owned. We've only tried it on Wii Party so far, but it works great. My daughter loves that it's pink! Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa L S

customer_reviews.title: be careful buying items like this
customer_reviews.text: It never worked, it was a Christmas gift so the packaging was thrown away so I can not return it.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Van A

customer_reviews.title: Always have to sincronise
customer_reviews.text: Almost everytime you turn on you have to sincronise again, nevertheless works very well! And it is pink! I love it!
customer_reviews.author: B.X.

customer_reviews.title: great buy for the price
customer_reviews.text: great buy just wish the listing would of said they are not motion plus then i would of spent the other 5 bucks and got the ones that where
customer_reviews.author: chadster

customer_reviews.title: Good deal
customer_reviews.text: I was worried about buying a non- Nintendo controller, but it works great. It even came with batteries. I would definitely buy this product again.
customer_reviews.author: Miranda J Victory

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Got a clear controller but works great! Came with package and instructions :)
customer_reviews.author: Timothy Yen

customer_reviews.title: But it's not bad
customer_reviews.text: It's a little less responsive and a little more clumsy. But it's not bad
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: works well
customer_reviews.text: It works OK. It loses syncronization every once in a while, but it's a good cheap alternative to a genuine wii remote.
customer_reviews.author: David Peterson

customer_reviews.title: Did not care for it!
customer_reviews.text: It did not work well with wii console.Then it just stopped working all together. I wish I had just gotten the orignal wii remote.
customer_reviews.author: Temea Robertson

customer_reviews.title: wands
customer_reviews.text: I ordered two of them one didn't work very long. They only played once with it and it stopped working. I'm returning it.
customer_reviews.author: Theresa Corona

customer_reviews.title: BRIGHT
customer_reviews.text: Much brighter blue than I was expecting. Works as expected. Works with the 2 different rechargeable battery packs i have. No issues at all.
customer_reviews.author: bw421

customer_reviews.title: works... sufficiently
customer_reviews.text: I bought two but it feels like only one because the other doesnt work at all. the one that does work gives you a hard time connecting but besides that works great!
customer_reviews.author: Carlos Del Angel

customer_reviews.title: Good price, good quality!
customer_reviews.text: This one works just as the controller that originally comes with the WII. So far, I have found nothing wrong with it:)
customer_reviews.author: L. Zepeda

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME PRICE FOR AWESOME REPLACEMENT
customer_reviews.text: Very good works just like the original, I am going to buy a motiion plus adapter so i will have a wii controller with motion yay!
customer_reviews.author: Yayee

customer_reviews.title: Pleasently Surprised
customer_reviews.text: This thing performs as well as the Wii Wand at a lower price. Don't know where it was shipped from but it arrived in a couple of days after purchase. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: theporche

customer_reviews.title: It's pretty good.
customer_reviews.text: It is cute and easy to use. It seems to respond well even with little kids using it. Thanks for having an inexpensive product.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Weakley

customer_reviews.title: not good
customer_reviews.text: would not sync to system, changed batteries, tried everything i could, i learned a lesson do not purchase out of production products
customer_reviews.author: Glenn Deering

customer_reviews.title: I love it.
customer_reviews.text: This is a realy good product, i works great i haven't had any problems with it. and it plays really good and my kids love the color.
customer_reviews.author: sina

customer_reviews.title: Nyko wand for wii
customer_reviews.text: This controller suck I will never bye ANYTHING FROM THESE PEOPLE AGAIN. THEY SUCK AND WILL NOT TAKE IT BACK SCREW YOU THEN.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie

customer_reviews.title: Great price!
customer_reviews.text: It works just as it is supposed to and cost much less than buying it from a local store. Very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: AngieYve

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Popped batteries in and was easily able to program it. It works perfectly...just as well as the wii brand remote.
customer_reviews.author: Stacey Samuels

customer_reviews.title: Works perfectly!
customer_reviews.text: Fun color, cheaper than the name brand ones, and it works just the same! I would recommend buying them to anyone!
customer_reviews.author: PattyBrat

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for!!
customer_reviews.text: Do not waste your money or time!!! Product not worth it at all ,will not stay synced once console is off.
customer_reviews.author: brandon

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work
customer_reviews.text: Wand doesn't work. Paid 15 dollars or so for a non working controller. It is ridiculous. Will never, ever do business with again.
customer_reviews.author: stevenharvey11

customer_reviews.title: Wish I would have bought the original Wii controller
customer_reviews.text: I have to re sync the Wand almost every time I turn the system on. Communications between the wand and the Wii console also become dropped fairly often during game play. The Wand also sometimes turns the Wii consol off unexpectedly. I am assuming that it is the Wand that turns the Wii console off, because this only happens when the Wand is being used. If only the Wii Remote is used, the Wii console never turns off unexpectedly. I sure do wish I didn't try to save a few dollars.
customer_reviews.author: R. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: wii not
customer_reviews.text: If its not a genuine wii mote don't waste your money. This purple wii wand has cost me more money in batteries then the wand itself is worth!
customer_reviews.author: Dragon

product_meta.title: Nyko Wand for Wii
product_meta.description:
Color:WhiteExperience new levels of immersion and innovation with Nyko’s Wand for Nintendo Wii. The Wand allows for complete control of all compatible Wii software and menus and features full motion control support, vibration feedback, and built-in speaker. With the Wand in your hand, you’ll have total control of all your Wii software as well as a rubberized B-Trigger, larger 1 and 2 buttons and an improved and re-worked d-pad for more comfortable and accurate classic and horizontal game play. The Wand is ergonomically crafted for left and right handed use with a form factor designed for maximum compatibility with 1st and 3rd party accessories. Expand your control possibilities with Nyko’s Trans-Port Technologies, exclusively developed for the Wand. Trans-Port Technology allows specially designed attachments to pass through key buttons to the attachment, allowing for more responsive attachments that can easily integrate with your Wand controller for a variety of games.

AMAZON.COM
Experience new levels of immersion and innovation with Nyko's Wand for Nintendo Wii. The Wand allows for complete control of all compatible Wii software and menus, and features full motion control support, vibration feedback, and built-in speaker. With the Wand in your hand, you'll have total control of all your Wii software as well as a rubberized B-Trigger, larger 1 and 2 buttons and an improved and reworked d-pad for more comfortable and accurate classic and horizontal game play. 

 

The Wand is ergonomically crafted for both left and right handed use with a form factor designed for maximum compatibility with any and all first and third party accessories for the Nintendo Wii. In addition, the Wand helps you expand your control possibilities with Nyko's Trans-Port Technologies, exclusively developed for the Wand. Transport Technology allows specially designed attachments to pass through key buttons to the attachment, allowing for more responsive attachments that can easily integrate with your Wand controller for a variety of games, meaning more flexibility and more fun each time you fire up your Wii. 


Key Features:  * Full compatibility with all Wii Software.
 * Transport Technology allows for use of custom shells and accessories.
 * Accelerometer for full motion control game play.
 * CMOS camera for pointer/cursor functionality.
 * Bluetooth technology allows for wireless play up to 20 feet away from the console.
 * Enlarged buttons and redesigned d-pad allow for convenient horizontal play.
 * Powerful speaker provides instant audio feedback.
 * Full rumble support.
 * Unique aesthetic design.
 * Rubberized battery cover for optimal grip and padded silicon for additional protection and safety.
feature_bullets: Full compatibility with all Wii Software
Trans-Port Technology allows for use of custom shells and accessories
Accelerometer for full motion control game play
Play wirelessly up to 20 feet away from the console
Trans-Port Technology relocates key buttons and vibration through specially designed accessories and attachments for better more immersive control
Enlarged and highly responsive buttons allow for more accurate and comfortable game play while a rubber grip insures a better hold of the remote
Bluetooth technology allows for wireless play up to 20 feet away from the console
Full motion control and pointer functionality provide full support for all Wii software and menus
Powerful speaker provides instant audio feedback
